task: MS1-T3: Deduplicate 87 AI/ML extracted JS files
hypothesis_note: Hypothesis was ~30 unique, ~57 duplicates. Actual: 33 unique functional groups, 41 duplicates/subsets, 7 stubs/config-only, 6 files are multi-module concatenations containing embedded copies of other standalone files.

critical_finding.description: 6 files are mega-bundles containing multiple concatenated modules. PRISM_REGULARIZATION_ENGINE.js (12613 lines) contains 31 separate modules. PRISM_DECISION_TREE_ENGINE.js (3172 lines) contains 7 modules. PRISM_AIRCUT_ELIMINATION_ENGINE.js (5228 lines) contains 5 modules. PRISM_UNIFIED_CAD_LEARNING_SYSTEM.js (5389 lines) contains 10 modules. PRISM_AI_100_PHYSICS_GENERATOR.js (3676 lines) contains 9 modules. PRISM_PHASE3_ADVANCED_RL.js (838 lines) contains 2 modules. Many of these embedded modules also exist as standalone files, creating extensive duplication.

groups.name: Neural Network Core

duplicates.reason: Subset - basic Sequential model, already included in PRISM_ML.js neuralNetwork section
Enhanced activations + layer creation, overlaps with PRISM_ML.js and PRISM_DL.js activations
Deep learning layer implementations (dense, LSTM, GRU, conv1d, pooling) - parallel impl to PRISM_ML.js
Standalone activations - subset of what PRISM_ML.js and PRISM_DL.js already provide

groups.description: Core neural network framework: Sequential model, layer creation (dense, conv, RNN), activation functions, forward/backward pass. PRISM_ML.js is the most comprehensive single-module version with NN + Q-learning + utils.

groups.name: Deep Learning (Phase-versioned)

duplicates.reason: Phase 6 version with tensor ops + architecture - different structure but overlapping scope (conv2D, pooling, dropout, batch norm)
STUB - failed extraction, contains only a note that the object does not exist

groups.description: Conv2D, pooling, batch norm, dropout, ResNet blocks, skip connections. Phase3 has 25 algorithms including CNN architectures. Phase6 has tensor ops + similar layers but shorter.

groups.name: Reinforcement Learning

duplicates.reason: Near-identical line count to RL_COMPLETE - Q-Learning + SARSA with manufacturing state spaces. Parallel implementation.
Tiny SARSA-only subset already covered in RL_COMPLETE and RL_QLEARNING
Basic DQN - subset of ADVANCED_DQN
DQN/Double DQN/Dueling DQN/PER - extends beyond RL_COMPLETE scope, KEEP as separate
PPO, A2C, SAC + signal processing (multi-module bundle). PPO/A2C extend beyond RL_COMPLETE scope, KEEP as separate

groups.description: Q-Learning, SARSA, Monte Carlo policy, value iteration for manufacturing parameter optimization. RL_COMPLETE is the canonical tabular RL. ADVANCED_DQN and PHASE3_ADVANCED_RL add deep RL methods.

groups.name: Clustering

duplicates.reason: Subset - K-Means, DBSCAN, hierarchical, spectral. COMPLETE version adds K-Medoids, Gaussian Mixture, Mean Shift, more.

groups.description: K-Means, DBSCAN, K-Medoids (PAM), Gaussian Mixture, hierarchical clustering, spectral clustering, Mean Shift. Used for grouping manufacturing features, defect classification.

groups.name: Attention Mechanisms

duplicates.reason: Scaled dot-product + multi-head attention. COMPLETE version adds cross-attention, relative positional encoding.
STUB - just a gateway route registration, not real code

groups.description: Scaled dot-product attention, multi-head attention, cross-attention, relative positional encoding per Vaswani et al.

groups.name: Explainable AI (XAI)

duplicates.reason: Gradient saliency + feature importance. COMPLETE version adds full LIME, SHAP, counterfactual explanations.

groups.description: LIME, SHAP, gradient saliency, feature importance, counterfactual explanations. Useful for explaining manufacturing AI decisions to operators.

groups.name: Bayesian Learning & Inference

duplicates.reason: Gaussian Process Regression - overlapping GP implementation with BAYESIAN_TOOL_LIFE but more generic
Bayesian parameter learner for speed/feed/DOC - overlaps with CALCULATOR_LEARNING_ENGINE posteriors

groups.description: Gaussian Process regression + Taylor tool life equation for probabilistic tool wear prediction. BAYESIAN_LEARNING provides generic GP, BAYESIAN_SYSTEM does Bayesian speed/feed optimization, BAYESIAN_TOOL_LIFE combines GP + Taylor equation.

groups.name: Optimization - Metaheuristic

duplicates.reason: KEEP SEPARATE - different algorithm (SA) but same domain (mfg parameter optimization)
KEEP SEPARATE - Genetic Algorithm, different algorithm
KEEP SEPARATE - DE optimizer, different algorithm

groups.description: Particle Swarm Optimization for feedrate/spindle/DOC optimization. Multi-objective with Pareto front. All four metaheuristics (PSO, SA, GA, DE) are unique algorithms but share manufacturing parameter bounds.

groups.name: Optimization - Mathematical

duplicates.reason: SGD, Adam, RMSProp, AdaGrad optimizers - gradient-based training optimizers, different scope than OPTIMIZATION_COMPLETE (which has SA/GA)
Nadam optimizer + advanced variants. Overlaps with OPTIMIZERS_ENGINE scope.

groups.description: OPTIMIZATION_COMPLETE has SA and GA classes. OPTIMIZERS_ENGINE has SGD/Adam/RMSProp for neural network training. OPTIMIZER_ADVANCED adds Nadam. Different scopes but 'optimization' theme.

groups.name: Time Series & Forecasting
groups.description: Exponential smoothing (SES, Holt, Holt-Winters), ARIMA, seasonal decomposition, change point detection. Critical for tool wear prediction, process monitoring, production forecasting.

groups.name: Graph Neural Networks
groups.description: Graph Convolutional Network (GCN), Graph Attention Network (GAT), message passing. For manufacturing process graphs, assembly relationships.

groups.name: Hyperparameter Optimization
groups.description: Search space definition, random/grid/Bayesian hyperparameter search, TPE (Tree-structured Parzen Estimators). Supports manufacturing ML model tuning.

groups.name: Learning Rate Scheduling
groups.description: Step decay, exponential decay, cosine annealing, warm restarts, 1cycle policy, linear warmup. Infrastructure for training ML models.

groups.name: Normalization Layers
groups.description: InstanceNorm, GroupNorm. Basic normalization layers. Short but functional. Missing BatchNorm (already in Phase3 deep learning).

groups.name: Online / Active Learning

duplicates.reason: KEEP SEPARATE - Active learning (query strategies) is distinct from online learning (experience replay, curriculum). Complementary modules.

groups.description: Experience replay buffer, prioritized replay, curriculum learning, continual learning. Critical for manufacturing systems that learn from shop floor feedback.

groups.name: Active Learning
groups.description: Uncertainty sampling, margin sampling, entropy sampling, query-by-committee. Minimizes labeling effort for manufacturing data (e.g., defect classification with limited expert labels).

groups.name: Uncertainty Quantification
groups.description: Monte Carlo Dropout, ensemble uncertainty, calibration. Critical for manufacturing - quantifies confidence in AI predictions for safety-critical decisions.

groups.name: ML Algorithms Collection

duplicates.reason: Bagging, boosting, stacking - subset of algorithms also in ML_ALGORITHMS
CONFIG ONLY - just hyperparameter constants (XGBoost, RF, SVM, LightGBM params), no actual implementation

groups.description: Linear/logistic regression, SVM, KNN, PCA, Naive Bayes, random forest. Broad classical ML algorithm library with 150+ algorithms claimed.

groups.name: Sequence Models (LSTM/GRU/Transformer)

duplicates.reason: LSTM cell only - subset of SEQUENCE_MODEL_ENGINE which has LSTM + GRU + bidirectional

groups.description: LSTM cell, GRU cell, bidirectional wrapper. For time-series machining data (vibration, tool wear progression, process sequences).

groups.name: Manufacturing Decision Engine

duplicates.reason: Simpler recommendation system that delegates to CALCULATOR_LEARNING_ENGINE. Overlapping scope with INTELLIGENT_DECISION_ENGINE's recommendation pipeline.

groups.description: Confidence scoring, multi-criteria decision making, explanation generation, learning from feedback. Core manufacturing decision support for tool selection, strategy, parameters.

groups.name: Physics-Informed Manufacturing AI
groups.description: Semi-Discretization Method for milling stability, Physics-Guided ML, SVM chatter classification, fractal feature extraction, Bayesian SLD update. Highly specialized machining vibration/chatter analysis.

groups.name: Lean Six Sigma / Quality
groups.description: SPC (Cp, Cpk, control charts), DMAIC, 5S scoring, OEE calculation, value stream mapping, kaizen tracking. Comprehensive quality management toolkit.

groups.name: Monte Carlo Simulation
groups.description: Monte Carlo simulation for tool life prediction with uncertainty. Taylor coefficient uncertainty modeling, confidence intervals. Critical for tool replacement scheduling.

groups.name: AI System Integration Hubs

duplicates.reason: Integration hub referencing TENSOR, NN_LAYERS, NLP, BAYESIAN etc. - orchestration duplicate
Integration hub referencing PHYSICS, SWARM, BAYESIAN, MONTE_CARLO - orchestration duplicate
Integration hub referencing TENSOR, NN_LAYERS, NEURAL_NETWORK, CLAUDE_API - orchestration duplicate

groups.description: Workflow orchestration (Print-to-Part pipeline), component initialization, AI suggestion routing. Four files all try to be 'the' integration hub with different component sets. Need to merge into one.

groups.name: AI Physics / Training Data Generation

duplicates.reason: Training data generation from materials DB - complementary but distinct scope (data gen vs physics models)
MEGA-BUNDLE containing physics data gen + 8 other modules. The physics generator portion (lines 1-242) overlaps with AI_PHYSICS_ENGINE

groups.description: Merchant cutting force model, Kienzle force model, Taylor tool life, surface finish prediction. Physics-based ML training data generation from manufacturing first principles.

groups.name: Manufacturing Feature Recognition
groups.description: CNN-based automatic manufacturing feature detection from CAD geometry (holes, pockets, slots, bosses, chamfers, threads). 20 feature types recognized.

groups.name: CAM / Machining Learning

duplicates.reason: Higher-level learning coordinator for cutting params, tool selection, strategy - overlapping scope with CAM_LEARNING but more abstract
Bayesian learning for calculator speed/feed posteriors - domain overlap with learning scope
KEEP SEPARATE - tool selection + automated CAM strategy, consumes learning engine outputs

groups.description: Learns feature-to-operation mappings, strategy parameters, material adjustments from machining outcomes. CAM_LEARNING is the core, UNIFIED_LEARNING is a coordinator, CALCULATOR_LEARNING does Bayesian parameter updates.

groups.name: Constraint Solving (CAD/Parametric)

duplicates.reason: Fusion 360-style sketch constraints - domain overlap (both solve geometric constraints)
General CSP solver (MRV, LCV, AC3) - algorithmic foundation used by constraint solvers
Machine/tool/material parameter constraints - different domain (machining limits vs geometric constraints)

groups.description: Parametric constraint solver for CAD sketches: dimensional + geometric constraints (distance, angle, horizontal, vertical, parallel, perpendicular, tangent, coincident). Newton-Raphson solver.

groups.name: CAD/Machine Learning (3D)

duplicates.reason: Standalone version of module embedded in UNIFIED_CAD (starts at line 1743 of bundle)
Blisk/impeller/turbine blade learning - specialized CAD learning, partially overlaps UNIFIED_CAD scope
Standalone version of module embedded in UNIFIED_CAD (starts at line 3140 of bundle)
Standalone version of module embedded in UNIFIED_CAD (starts at line 3514 of bundle)
Standalone version of module embedded in UNIFIED_CAD (starts at line 3969 of bundle)

groups.description: MEGA-BUNDLE: Unified CAD learning from uploaded STEP files, machine 3D models, axis behavior learning, contact/collision detection and learning. The bundle is the canonical source; standalone files are redundant extractions.

groups.name: Aircut Elimination / Toolpath Optimization
groups.description: MEGA-BUNDLE: Air-cut detection in toolpaths, optimization of rapid moves, BVH spatial indexing. Also contains INNOVATION_REGISTRY, STRUCTURE_CHANGELOG, LAYER2_VERIFICATION (non-AI modules bundled in). The core aircut detection (~787 lines) is unique and high-value.

groups.name: Probabilistic Reasoning
groups.description: Particle filter, HMM (Hidden Markov Model), Bayesian networks. For probabilistic state estimation in manufacturing (tool state, process phase detection).

groups.name: Graph Algorithms
groups.description: Kruskal MST, Dijkstra, Bellman-Ford, topological sort, SCC (Tarjan). For toolpath optimization, operation sequencing, process dependency graphs.

groups.name: NLP for Manufacturing
groups.description: Manufacturing vocabulary tokenization, special tokens. Basic NLP for interpreting manufacturing text commands/descriptions. Needs expansion for production use.

unique_standalone.name: PRISM_PSO_OPTIMIZER.js
unique_standalone.description: Particle Swarm Optimization for feedrate/spindle/DOC. Multi-objective Pareto optimization.

unique_standalone.name: PRISM_SIMULATED_ANNEALING.js
unique_standalone.description: Simulated annealing with reheating, adaptive cooling, multi-start. Manufacturing parameter optimization.

unique_standalone.name: PRISM_GA_ENGINE.js
unique_standalone.description: Genetic algorithm with tournament selection, crossover, mutation. Manufacturing parameter optimization.

unique_standalone.name: PRISM_DIFFERENTIAL_EVOLUTION.js
unique_standalone.description: Differential Evolution optimizer (rand1bin, best1bin strategies). Manufacturing bounds built in.

unique_standalone.name: PRISM_ADVANCED_DQN.js
unique_standalone.description: Deep Q-Network + Double DQN + Dueling DQN + Prioritized Experience Replay. Advanced deep RL.

unique_standalone.name: PRISM_AI_AUTO_CAM.js
unique_standalone.description: Automated CAM: tool selection, operation sequencing, strategy recommendation from features.

unique_standalone.name: PRISM_PIML_CHATTER_ENGINE.js
unique_standalone.description: Physics-Informed ML for milling stability/chatter prediction. Semi-Discretization Method.

unique_standalone.name: PRISM_LEAN_SIX_SIGMA_KAIZEN.js
unique_standalone.description: SPC, DMAIC, 5S, OEE, value stream mapping, kaizen tracking.

unique_standalone.name: PRISM_MONTE_CARLO_ENGINE.js
unique_standalone.description: Monte Carlo simulation for tool life with Taylor equation uncertainty.

unique_standalone.name: PRISM_ML_FEATURE_RECOGNITION.js
unique_standalone.description: CNN-based manufacturing feature recognition (20 feature types).

unique_standalone.name: PRISM_OCR_ENGINE.js
unique_standalone.description: OCR via Tesseract.js for reading engineering drawings/prints.

unique_standalone.name: PRISM_MESH_REPAIR_ENGINE.js
unique_standalone.description: Mesh boundary detection, hole filling, non-manifold repair for CAD/STL files.

unique_standalone.name: PRISM_FAILSAFE_GENERATOR.js
unique_standalone.description: Generates conservative safe machining parameters when AI confidence is low.

unique_standalone.name: PRISM_MODEL_COMPRESSION_ENGINE.js
unique_standalone.description: INT8 quantization, pruning, knowledge distillation for deploying ML models.

unique_standalone.name: PRISM_LOSS_FUNCTIONS_ENGINE.js
unique_standalone.description: MSE, MAE, cross-entropy, Huber, focal loss. Infrastructure for training.

unique_standalone.name: PRISM_DECISION_TREE_ENGINE.js
unique_standalone.description: MEGA-BUNDLE: ID3/C4.5 decision tree + 6 optimization modules (rapid path, unconstrained, trust region, constrained, SQP, combinatorial). The decision tree (~222 lines) is the AI module; the optimizers are mathematical.

stubs_and_config_only.reason: Single comment line - just a usage note pointing to PRISM_DEEP_LEARNING_PARAMS.getCNN()
Gateway route registration only - 3 lines of route config, no implementation
Failed extraction - file contains a note saying the object does not exist in source
Hyperparameter constants only (Kalman, ARIMA, exponential smoothing, anomaly detection params). Zero functions.
Hyperparameter constants only (XGBoost, RF, SVM, LightGBM, PCA, UMAP, t-SNE params). Zero functions.
Hyperparameter constants only (transformer dims, attention params, optimizer params, LR schedules, regularization, gradient control, initialization). Zero functions.
Route registration only - 3 route paths, no implementation

archive: PRISM_DL.js (parallel impl to PRISM_ML.js - merge best parts)

needs_splitting.action: SPLIT into individual module files. Contains 31 separate modules concatenated. The standalone files already extracted cover many of them. This mega-bundle should be archived after confirming all sub-modules are independently available.
SPLIT into individual module files. Contains 7 modules. Decision tree portion is only ~215 lines.

Keep as canonical bundle OR split. 4 of its 10 embedded modules already exist as standalone files (MACHINE_3D_LEARNING, AXIS_BEHAVIOR, CONTACT_CONSTRAINT, CONTACT_CONSTRAINT_LEARNING). The remaining 6 are unique to this bundle.
Keep core aircut module (~787 lines). Archive or split out INNOVATION_REGISTRY, STRUCTURE_CHANGELOG, LAYER2_VERIFICATION, BVH_ENGINE as separate files.

Split. Core physics generator is ~242 lines. Contains duplicates of LEAN_SIX_SIGMA_KAIZEN (already standalone). Other embedded modules (RL_ENHANCED, NN_ENHANCED, CLUSTERING_ENHANCED, SIGNAL_ENHANCED) may be unique.

merge.reason: Both implement neural network layers. PRISM_DL.js has GRU implementation that PRISM_ML.js lacks. Merge GRU from DL into ML.
Four integration hubs referencing different component sets. Merge into single orchestration hub.
Three Bayesian modules. TOOL_LIFE has GP + Taylor equation. LEARNING has generic GP. SYSTEM has parameter posteriors. Merge into unified Bayesian manufacturing module.
Three learning engines with overlapping scope. CAM_LEARNING is most specific. Merge Bayesian parameter updates from CALCULATOR_LEARNING.
Both implement gradient-based optimizers. Merge Nadam from ADVANCED into OPTIMIZERS_ENGINE.
